A mamzer
person born from certain forbidden relationship
1:
--------------------
Text: Mamzer:  A "mamzer" in modern Jewish culture is someone who is either born out of adultery by a married Jewish woman and a Jewish man who is not her husband, or born out of incest (as defined by the Bible), or someone who has a "mamzer" as a parent.
